description.lang: BL900HW is the service gateway device to provide the KDDI's FTTH service.So this can be used only in KDDI's network.This also has the following featuresWireless router technology : IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n dual band.Number of USB PortsUSB2.01 portNumber of Ether port : 1Gbps4port type RJ45Dial-up port 1port type RJ11When you use this device as the z-wave gateway, you have to subscribe the KDDI's FTTH service and plug the special dongle provided by KDDI to USB port.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline; A NOTIFICATION frame is sent to the nodes in this association group when a Lifeline event occurs.
